```{r fig.height=3, fig.cap = "Iris sepal length"}
  group_by(Species) |>
  summarise(sepal_length_mean = mean(Sepal.Length)) |>
  ggplot(aes(x = Species, y = sepal_length_mean, fill = Species)) +
  geom_col() +
  coord_flip() +
  scale_fill_omni_discrete() +
  theme_omni()
```
